App.Title: Used Car Data Analysis with Statistical Elements and Data Visualization
App.Name: Statistic date analysis

Header.Title: Information
Header.Description1: Project titled 'Used Car Data Analysis with Statistical Elements and Data Visualization' using the Angular framework with a .Net backend. The project utilizes a dataset
Header.Description2: to showcase the capabilities of the prepared solution. Elements displayed on each diagram are editable.

Descriptions.bar: A bar chart represents data as rectangular bars with varying heights.
Descriptions.line: A line chart displays data as a series of points connected by lines, revealing trends.
Descriptions.pie: A pie chart shows proportions between categories as segments of a circle.
Descriptions.doughnut: A doughnut chart is similar to a pie chart but has a hollow center, providing better data visualization.
